about_the_game:
New third-person beat'em up with shooter elements from the makers of December 24th!


This project takes the best from the Mafia and Yakuza series, adds its own Soviet-Turkmen flavor and mixes it all in a blender.

The year is 1992. In the unnamed country of former socialism, the Nilgor mafia family is looking for a new driver.
However, not very long time passes - and he finds himself between a hammer and an anvil, drawn into the abyss of bloody fights between many families and clans, originating 13 years ago...
Now it's up to him to figure it all out and end years of gang warfare.

Take control of Montana, Gustav, Kurbon or Captain Gazman and take part in the biggest criminal showdowns of those years!

Featuring:

  • story from the masters of their craft (based on the unpublished book by Orazberdy Owezow "We are all angels")
  • 4 playable characters
  • 15 big and cool chapters
  • several large cities and dungeons opened for exploration
  • close combat and various kinds of firearms is avaliable
  • advanced weapon and combat style upgrade system
  • cinematic-level cutscenes
  • full two-languages dub
  • soundtrack from such well-known performers as Shkumbin Kreziyu, Les Bebras and the Kazarma band
